subject: Project Orion: Design review meeting
body:
Hi team,

Let's have a design review for Project Orion on Wednesday at 2pm. Please bring UI mocks and the architecture diagram. Can someone own the meeting notes?

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Your weekly product digest
body: Here are the top stories this week... (newsletter content)

subject: Benefits enrollment reminder
body: Open enrollment closes next Friday. Please review your options and complete the enrollment form.

subject: You won a prize!!!
body: Click here to claim your reward: http://spam.example/claim

subject: Request: updated sales numbers
body: Hey — could you send the updated Q3 sales spreadsheet? I need it by Friday morning so I can include it in the board packet. Thanks, Bob

subject: Sprint retro notes and actions
body: Thanks for attending. Action items: 1) Improve CI pipeline (assigned to Sam), 2) Update onboarding docs (no owner yet). Please confirm owners.

subject: Upcoming community meetup — RSVP
body: Join our community meetup this month. RSVP to reserve your seat.

subject: Invoice 2025-998 attached
body: Please review and approve Invoice 2025-998 for services rendered in October. Due date: 2025-11-20.

subject: Quarterly strategy update
body: Attached is the Q4 strategy doc. Please read before Monday's all-hands; we'll discuss goals and metrics.

subject: Interview invite — Product Designer
body: We'd like to invite you to interview next Tuesday. Please let us know your availability.

subject: Black Friday preview — 40% off
body: Exclusive early access to deals for subscribers.

subject: Deployment scheduled tonight
body: We will deploy release v1.4.2 at 23:00 UTC. Rollback plan attached. Please standby if you're on-call.

subject: Please revise the proposal
body: Thanks for the draft. Could you update section 2 with a clearer timeline and add pricing tiers? We need the revision by Thursday.

subject: You have new followers
body: People started following your profile. Check your updates.

subject: Alert: high error rate in payments service
body: We've detected a spike in 500s on payments. Please investigate and roll back the last change if needed.
